subject: Invoice for Samuel Drum Lessons
body:
Hello Brad Childress,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Samuel Drum Lessons): for a total of $75.00.

Details


Samuel Drum Lessons: 1 invoice totaling $75.00


Invoice #5 for $75.00


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $75.00



Thank You,
Greg Goad Music Instruction

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.
